nodes.text: Into the Woods is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on July 15, 2004 and took the form of an interview by Ryk Osentay of Cularin Central Broadcasting with renowned treasure hunter Brin Hesk'l. The story was also accompanied by roleplaying statistics for using Hesk'l in other campaigns.
